__TOC__

This procedure describes how to install the WindowsVista <nowiki>[[Fonts]]</nowiki> in Ubuntu.

 1. Download the free PowerPoint Viewer 2007 from the  <nowiki>[[http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=048dc840-14e1-467d-8dca-19d2a8fd7485&displaylang=en|Microsfot website]]</nowiki>
 2. Install cabextract from <nowiki>[[APT]]</nowiki> and extract the above file.
 3. In the new folder, run cabextract on ppviewer.cab
 4. Create new font directory in the system;
    sudo mkdir /usr/share/fonts/truetype/vistafonts/
 5. Move the files and change owership
    sudo mv *.TTF *.TTC /usr/share/fonts/truetype/vistafonts/
    sudo chown root:root /usr/share/fonts/truetype/vistafonts/*
 6. Index the new fonts for X to fin:
    sudo fc-cache -fv
